home.me: As a software engineering student, I specialize in creating modern and high-performance applications. My journey has allowed me to develop strong expertise in full-stack development, with a particular interest in emerging technologies such as artificial intelligence and cloud computing.

sopra_steria.description: Participation in the development of the ARPEGE project (national system for automating the management of sick leave and daily allowances for Social Security) by implementing front-end and back-end functionalities (AngularJS, Java, Python) in an agile environment.

capgemini.description: Contribution to the development of a computer-aided maintenance management system (C#, SQL).

imt_mines_ales.description: Engineering program in computer science and networks through an apprenticeship, specializing in software development.

gtrsuite.description: Design and development of front-end and back-end features for a Drive-To-Store application (Vue.js, Node.js, Nest.js) in an agile environment.

stmicroelectronics.description: Maintenance of Node.js libraries, proactive bug fixes, and development of new full-stack features on various tools (Vue.js, Express, MongoDB).

iut_grenoble.description: Bachelor's degree in computer science with a specialization in application development.
